article: One day Daddy and I went out  _  a walk. On the way we  saw  a lot of people. We went up and  _  a look. Oh, dear!  _  did we see? There  _  a donkey in the middle of the road. It would not move. The cars and buses could not get  _  . Then a policeman came."  _  donkey is this?" he asked. "It' s  _  ," said a farmer, "but I  _  move it." The policeman and the farmer did  _  best to move the donkey, but it would not move. We laughed, but the  _  of the cars and the buses were  _  . "We can't move the donkey," the farmer and the policeman said. "What shall we do?" "Give him a carrot," my father said. "  That's  a good idea!" said the farmer. Soon he found a  _  and showed it to the donkey. When the donkey saw a carrot, it jumped up and walked after the farmer.  All  the cars and buses could get past at last.
